persName.roleName: Baron de Dunstanville of Tehidy and Baron Basset of Stratton

note.p: Death: Stratheden House, Knightsbridge, London (05 February 1835)
Education: Harrow, later at Eton, and King's College Cambridge (MA 1786)
Career: Freemason, 12 April 1779 at Somerset House Lodge No 2
Honours: Bt 1779; Baron de Dunstanville 1796; Baron Basset 1797
Freemasons and the Royal Society: Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Masons' Library and Museum of Freemasonr, 2010 page 7-8
Notes: On reverse of certificate: 'Mr Hennell to be admitted'; 'Captain Hutchinson, [...] elected at the late'
